column4: Is there any easy way to add the lavcac3enc filter to mplayer in ubuntu?
not sure  actually  but...you could join the  #mplayer channel to find out if there is an easy way if it is not already installed
- They told me to compile it on my own...
that makes sense.... compiling mplayer should not be that difficutlt  ...did they tell you how to include that ?
- I just prefer to fix it through repositories, if possible...

I think...if that plugin or codec is not already in the pacakge  I dont think there are patches for this...it is most likely  you will have to compile the entire pacakge with the apparopariate tags for that plugin
- Maybe I just need a different lavc...
I am not sure let me check  ...what is it again?
- For encoding ac3 on the fly
mm  is this for audio  or video?
- mplayer -af help gives you a list
mm  ok    I am sure there are audio converters for on the fly conversions  although I am not up on all of the them   let me checkj
- Well, they use the filter lavc3enc, which I don't have.
- (Sorry, I had the nam wrong before)
